chunk: KOJIC ACID, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, AVENA SATIVA (OAT) KERNAL EXTRACT, CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) EXTRACT, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT, POLYSORBATE 20, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, DARUTOSIDE.

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
